description: This file defines the Java class 'DeviceLeaveRequest', which models a request to remove a Zigbee device (identified by eui64) from the mock Zigbee core. It includes methods to execute the request by interacting with the core singleton, removing the device if it exists, and sending a response.

classes.name: DeviceLeaveRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to remove or 'leave' a Zigbee device from the mock Zigbee network. Extends the base 'Request' class and includes device-specific parameters such as eui64, withRejoin, and isEndDevice, with logic to execute this request.

methods.name: DeviceLeaveRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes a new request with requestId, device eui64, rejoin flag, and end device flag.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Executes the device leave request by removing the device from the core, if it exists, and sending a response.
